Events that occurred on 30 January

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1914 - The Chequers Clubbe, founded by J.R.R. Tolkien, is given permission to organize dinners.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 96.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to his grandson Michael George Tolkien.
2000 - Actress Markella Kavenagh is born.
2000 - Tolkien's Legendarium is published.
2005 - "The Invented Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien" exhibition at Marquette University ends.
2014 - Director Arthur Rankin, Jr. dies.
2017 - Actor Victor Platt dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
First quarter[1]

content.content: ↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, "Time-scheme for The Lord of the Rings" (Marquette MSS 4/2/18) in Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull (eds), The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion, p. xlix
